p: Twenty samples of propolis, seven of black poplars (PN1–7) and six of aspen (PT1–6) buds were analyzed in this work. Samples of bee glues were a mixture of material from different hives in the same apiary. These samples originated from Lower Silesia (12 samples: PR-LS1–6, PR-NW1–2, PR-ŚL1–2, PR-MR, and PR-NSW), West Pomerania (Szczecin, 4 samples: PR-SZ1–4), Podkarpacie (2 samples: PR-S1–2), Germany (commercial sample: PR-GR) and Canada (PR-CN).
